steps.description: No uncommitted changes in the worktree
steps.agent_instructions: Run git status. If any files are staged or modified, commit or stash them before proceeding.

steps.description: Critic report has been generated recently
steps.agent_instructions: Run tools/cdd/status.sh to ensure the Critic report is current. Check CRITIC_REPORT.md for any unresolved action items for your role.

steps.description: Current branch follows the naming convention (spec/*, impl/*, or qa/*)
steps.agent_instructions: Verify the current branch name follows the convention: spec/* for Architect, impl/* for Builder, qa/* for QA. If not, consider renaming before merge.

steps.description: All modified feature specs pass the Critic Spec Gate (architect=DONE)
steps.agent_instructions: Check CRITIC_REPORT.md for any Architect action items. All modified feature specs should have architect=DONE in the CDD status.

steps.description: All new feature files have an Implementation Notes section or companion file stub
steps.agent_instructions: For each new feature file created in this session, verify it has either an ## Implementation Notes section or a companion .impl.md file stub.

steps.description: If the feature has a Visual Specification section, all required fields are present
steps.agent_instructions: For each feature with a ## Visual Specification section, verify all screens have a Reference field and at least one checklist item.

steps.description: tests/<feature>/tests.json exists with status PASS for all modified features
steps.agent_instructions: For each feature you implemented, verify tests/<feature>/tests.json exists and contains status PASS. Run the test suite if needed.

steps.description: Implementation Notes section updated with any DEVIATION or DISCOVERY entries
steps.agent_instructions: Review your implementation decisions. Any non-trivial choices should be documented with [DEVIATION] or [DISCOVERY] tags in the feature's Implementation Notes or companion file.

steps.description: A [Ready for Verification] or [Complete] status commit exists for all implemented features
steps.agent_instructions: For each feature you implemented, verify a status tag commit exists: [Ready for Verification features/<name>.md] or [Complete features/<name>.md].

steps.description: All manual scenarios for in-scope features have been verified (PASS or recorded FAIL)
steps.agent_instructions: For each feature in your verification scope, confirm all manual scenarios have been executed and results recorded.

steps.description: All OPEN discoveries have been recorded and committed
steps.agent_instructions: Check the ## User Testing Discoveries section of each verified feature. All findings should be recorded with appropriate type tags and committed.

steps.description: A [Complete] commit exists for all clean features (zero discoveries)
steps.agent_instructions: For each feature with zero open discoveries, verify a [Complete features/<name>.md] status commit exists.
